games.title: My Town Home: Family Playhouse
games.description: Discover **My Town Home: Family Playhouse**, a vibrant online dollhouse adventure that sparks your imagination. Explore six unique rooms, create family narratives, and enjoy activities like cooking and gardening. Play for **free** on your phone or computer and craft your ideal virtual family experience.
games.howToPlayText:
The navigation in this game is very simple.
On desktop: use the mouse click.
On mobile: use your finger tap.
